sen.j: 平 好風（たいら の よしかぜ、生没年不詳）は、平安時代中期の人物。
sen.e: TAIRA no Yoshikaze (date of birth and death unknown) was a man in the mid Heian period of Japan.

sen.j: 桓武天皇の子・仲野親王の子・刑部省加賀国茂世王の長子であり、貞観 (日本)16年（874年）に臣籍降下して平氏を名乗るようになった。
sen.e: Yoshikaze was the oldest son of TAIRA no Shigeyo (Prince Shigeyo) in Gyobusho (Ministry of Justice) of Kaga province, who was a son of Imperial Prince Nakano, who was a son of Emperor Kammu, and Yoshikaze demoted from nobility to subject in 874 and called himself one of the Taira clan.
